name: Trainline.com Limited
goal:
We are a European-based independent digital rail and coach platform company that seeks to promote sustainable travel by building and marketing leading solutions for European customers to plan and book their rail and coach travel via mobile and website channels.

Our mission is:

To help customers make smarter journeys every day, and save them time hassle and money;

To champion rail as the smarter mode of transport;

To deliver incremental customers to our Train and Coach Company Partners.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Rail reform, specifically 4th Railway Package

Digital Single Market

Multi-modal travel information consultation

Stakeholder consultation on rail passengers' rights and obligations

PSI Directive/Open Data Directive

ITS Directive and Delegated Acts

Consultation on bus and coach passengers' rights and obligations
